item.title: Amortized Fourier Neural Operators
item.description: Amortized Fourier Neural Operators (AM-FNOs) dramatically improve efficiency in solving PDEs by using neural networks for kernel parameterization, achieving up to 31% better accuracy compared to exist…

item.title: Diff-eRank: A Novel Rank-Based Metric for Evaluating Large Language Models
item.description: Diff-eRank: A novel rank-based metric assessing LLMs’ efficiency in eliminating redundant information during training, showing improved correlation with model size and performance.
